column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Amazing breakfast! The portions are very generous
column2: so come hungry! The kids meal us a great value. The cinnamon roll pancakes were fantastic! The wildberry bliss French Toast is quite good
column3: but ask for the toppings on the side. The Red Velvet French Toast is also good
column4: but quite sweet. This place gets very busy. Go early or you will have to wait!
